Empty State Animations

During my time working for Microsoft, I drew and animated several empty state illustrations for various products and web pages. These were drawn in Adobe Illustrator and animated in After Effects. Contact me to learn more about the products these were used in.

Illustrations used for an empty cart.

404 error illustration

Payment error illustrations

Successful purchase illustration

Illustrations for linking and removing a credit card
